panels.title: Agency Gateway Application

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.jobName as jobName,n.result as result where time>(timestamp()/1000)-1*86400  AND jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev"] return result as Status,count(distinct n.buildNumber) as APIBuildJobs

panels.title: API Dev Build Breakdown for Last 24 Hours

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.jobName as jobName,n.result as result where time>(timestamp()/1000)-1*86400  AND jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA"] return result as Status,count(distinct n.buildNumber) as APIBuildJobs

panels.title: API QA Build Breakdown for Last 24 Hours

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.jobName as jobName,n.result as result where time>(timestamp()/1000)-1*86400  AND jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] return result as Status,count(distinct n.buildNumber) as APIBuildJobs

panels.title: API Stage Build Breakdown for Last 24 Hours

targets.target: match (n:CI) where n.result="FAILURE" AND n.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND (tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) return n.inSightsTimeX as inSightsTimeX, count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Failed order by  inSightsTimeX

match (n:CI) where n.result="SUCCESS" AND n.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND (tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) return n.inSightsTimeX as inSightsTimeX, count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Success order by  inSightsTimeX

panels.title: API Build Trend

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.jobName as jobName,n.result as result where time>(timestamp()/1000)-1*86400  AND jobName IN ["Build_Dev"] return result as Status,count(distinct n.buildNumber) as UIBuildJobs

panels.title: UI Dev Build Breakdown for Last 24 Hours

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.jobName as jobName,n.result as result where time>(timestamp()/1000)-1*86400  AND jobName IN ["Build_QA",  "Build_QA_Branch_Merge"] return result as Status,count(distinct n.buildNumber) as UIBuildJobs

panels.title: UI QA Build Breakdown for Last 24 Hours

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.jobName as jobName,n.result as result where time>(timestamp()/1000)-1*86400  AND jobName IN ["Build_Stage"] return result as Status,count(distinct n.buildNumber) as UIBuildJobs

panels.title: UI Stage Build Breakdown for Last 24 Hours

targets.target: match (n:CI) where (n.result="FAILURE" OR n.result="UNSTABLE")  AND n.jobName IN ["Build_Dev", "Build_QA",  "Build_QA_Branch_Merge", "Build_Stage"] AND (tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) return n.inSightsTimeX as inSightsTimeX, count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Failed order by  inSightsTimeX

match (n:CI) where n.result="SUCCESS" AND n.jobName IN ["Build_Dev", "Build_QA",  "Build_QA_Branch_Merge", "Build_Stage"] AND (tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) return n.inSightsTimeX as inSightsTimeX, count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Success order by  inSightsTimeX

panels.title: UI Build Trend

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.jobName as jobName,n.result as result   where jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA","API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA","Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] return jobName,result,n.buildNumber as buildNumber,split(n.inSightsTimeX,"Z")[0] as BuildTime,collect(distinct n.buildUrl) as buildURL,time,n.shortDescription as Description order by time desc limit 5

panels.title: Last 5 API Builds

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.jobName as jobName,n.result as result   where jobName IN ["Build_Dev", "Build_QA", "Build_QA_Branch_Merge" ,"Build_Stage"] return jobName,result,n.buildNumber as buildNumber,n.inSightsTimeX as BuildTime,collect(distinct n.buildUrl) as buildURL,time,n.shortDescription as Description order by time desc limit 5

panels.title: Last 5 UI Builds

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.jobName as jobName where time>(timestamp()/1000)-1*86400 and jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] return jobName,count(distinct n) as buildCount

panels.title: Total No.of API Builds for Last 24 Hours

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.jobName as jobName where time>(timestamp()/1000)-7*86400 and jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] return jobName,count(distinct n) as buildCount

panels.title: Total No.of API Builds for last 7 days

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.jobName as jobName where time>(timestamp()/1000)-30*86400 and jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] return jobName,count(distinct n) as buildCount

panels.title: Total No.of API Builds for last 30 days

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.jobName as jobName where time>(timestamp()/1000)-1*86400 and jobName IN ["Build_Dev", "Build_QA", "Build_QA_Branch_Merge" ,"Build_Stage"] return jobName,count(distinct n) as buildCount order by buildCount desc

panels.title: Total No.of UI Builds for last 1 day

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.jobName as jobName where time>(timestamp()/1000)-7*86400 and jobName IN ["Build_Dev", "Build_QA", "Build_QA_Branch_Merge" ,"Build_Stage"] return jobName,count(distinct n) as buildCount order by buildCount desc

panels.title: Total No.of UI Builds for last 7 days

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.jobName as jobName where time>(timestamp()/1000)-30*86400 and jobName IN ["Build_Dev", "Build_QA", "Build_QA_Branch_Merge" ,"Build_Stage"] return jobName,count(distinct n) as buildCount order by buildCount desc

panels.title: Total No.of UI Builds for last 30 days

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA {result:"SUCCESS"}) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time where time>(timestamp()/1000)-1*86400 and n.jobName IN ["Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage"] return count(distinct n.buildUrl) as BuildCount

panels.title: Successful Build Deployments for Last 24 hrs

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA {result:"SUCCESS"}) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time where time>(timestamp()/1000)-7*86400 and n.jobName IN ["Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage"] return count(distinct n.buildUrl) as BuildCount

panels.title: Successful Build Deployments for Last 7 days

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA {result:"SUCCESS"}) with n as n,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time where time>(timestamp()/1000)-30*86400 and n.jobName IN ["Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage"] return count(distinct n.buildUrl) as BuildCount

panels.title: Successful Build Deployments for Last 30 days
